verdict_rationale: Interview materials prepared and ready for execution. KPIs cannot be calculated until founder completes 10-15 customer discovery interviews. This is a preparation phase, not an analysis phase.

kpis.name: Pain Intensity
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q4 (0-10 pain scale)

kpis.name: Active Workarounds
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q5 (workarounds)

kpis.name: Recency
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q2 (problem experienced within 30 days)

kpis.name: Solution Resonance
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q9, Q16 (positive reaction to solution)

kpis.name: Competitive Displacement
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q10 (willingness to switch)

kpis.name: Outcome Alignment
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q8, Q12, Q15 (solution matches desired outcomes)

kpis.name: Budget Existence
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q17 (budget allocated)

kpis.name: Purchase Intent
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q25 (purchase intent â‰¥4/5) and Q26 (pilot willingness)

kpis.name: Interview Completion Rate
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting completion of 10-15 interviews (completed / scheduled)

kpis.name: Van Westendorp Pricing Convergence
kpis.evidence: Not yet measured - awaiting interview data from Q21-Q24 (too expensive, too cheap, expensive but acceptable, bargain price)

next_steps: Founder to recruit 10-15 interview participants using provided templates
Complete interview tracking template for each interview
After 10-15 interviews, calculate KPIs and update this file
Analyzer agent to compute final verdict: GO/CONDITIONAL/NO-GO
